chinese: 我们应该尝试解决这个问题
english: we should try to solve this problem

chinese: 我们应该尝试尽快解决这个问，题
english: we should try to solve this problem as soon as possible

chinese: 我将会尝试解决这个问题
english: I will try to solve this problem

chinese: 我将会设法解决这个问题
english: I will manage to solve this problem

chinese: 我将会尝试完成我的家庭作业
english: I will try to finish my homework

chinese: 我将会尝试在睡觉之前完成我，的家庭作业
english: I will try to finish my homework before bedtime

chinese: 我将会设法在睡觉之前完成我，的家庭作业
english: I will manage to finish my homework before bedtime

chinese: 你(过去)如何做这件事的？ how did you do it？
你(过去)如何设法做到这件事，的？
english: how did you manage to do it?

chinese: 你(过去)如何设法做到如此迅，速地到达这里的？
english: how did you manage to get here so quickly?

chinese: 你(过去)如何设法做到赚如此，多的钱的？
english: how did you manage to make so much money?

chinese: 在一段如此短的时间里
你(过去)如何设法做到赚如此，多的钱的？
english: how did you manage to make so much money?

chinese: 你(过去)如何设法做到在一段，如此短的时间里赚如此多的钱，的？
english: how did you manage to make so much money in such a short time?

chinese: 你(过去)如何设法做到写这本，书的？
english: how did you manage to write this book?

chinese: 你(过去)如何设法做到写这本，书的？
english: how did you manage to write this book?

chinese: 你(过去)如何设法做到写这本，书的当你(过去)在监狱里？
english: how did you manage to write this book when you were in prison?

chinese: 克服你的公开演讲的恐惧
english: to overcome your fear of public speaking

chinese: 你(过去)如何设法做到克服你，的公开演讲的恐惧的？
english: how did you manage to overcome your fear of public speaking?

chinese: 在工作和生活之间的平衡
english: the balance between work and life

chinese: 保持在工作和生活之间的平衡
english: to keep the balance between work and life

chinese: 你(过去)如何设法做到保持在，工作和生活之间的平衡的？
english: how did you manage to keep the balance between work and life?

chinese: 为那个度假存足够的钱
english: to save enough money for that vacation

chinese: 你(过去)如何设法做到为那个，度假存足够的钱的？
english: how did you manage to save enough money for that vacation?

chinese: 在一段如此短的时间里
你(过去)如何设法做到为那个，度假存足够的钱的？
english: how did you manage to save enough money for that vacation?

chinese: 你(过去)如何设法做到在一段，如此短的时间里为那个度假存，足够的钱的？
english: how did you manage to save enough money for that vacation in such a short time?

english: 1. 你（过去）如何设法成功找到你的丢失的钥匙的？ 2. 你（过去）如何设法成功学习一门新的语言的？

english: 1.How did you manage to find your lost keys? 2.How did you manage to learn a new language?
